question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
stew meat
4 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 clove garlic
1 medium onion
1 or 2 bay leaves
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
dash of allspice or cloves
12 oz. Larry's Blend (ground chuck), handle with care
2 oz. American cheese
2 of Steve's onion buns (fresh, of coarse!)
mushrooms and bacon (optional but good)
16 oz. vodka
12 oz. ice
4 oz. Squirt (watch Squirt, very expensive)
Directions:
Make sure you have enough ice.
Next, chop mushrooms.
Fry bacon and chop into small bits.
Make second drink and call off work for tomorrow while you can still talk (great idea).
Take Larry's Blend and fold in mushrooms and bacon (easy).
Turn on VH-1.
Turn up volume.
Get buns and cheese ready.
Put burgers on grill.
Keep an eye on them and flip when juice comes through. Turn up VH-1 and hope no one is home next door.
Better make a pitt stop next!
Be sure to refresh you drink (if you can find the vodka).
When juice runs clear (burgers not vodka) they are done. Place on buns with cheese.
Eat, drink and pass out!!!
Then you start over tomorrow.
Next cookbook will contain recipe for "The Perfect Porterhouse."
explanation: The provided answer is entirely unrelated to making a classic beef stew. It discusses ingredients and steps for a burger recipe, including a strange mix of beer, vodka, and inappropriate references to drinking and socializing. It does not provide any information regarding the preparation or cooking process for a traditional beef stew.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. onion powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. oil
2 c. water
1 medium onion, sliced
2 bay leaves
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. tarragon
1 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
6 carrots, cut into bite size chunks
4 to 6 onions, quartered, or 12 small whole onions
6 to 8 potatoes, cut into chunks
2 ribs celery, sliced
1 can peas, drained
1 c. water
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Put flour, seasoned salt, onion powder and pepper in a bag. Toss meat in flour mixture.
In a large pot, brown meat in oil. Add water and all ingredients listed down to carrots.
Stir and simmer 10 minutes.
Add carrots, onions, potatoes and celery. Cover and simmer 45 minutes.
Mix last 4 ingredients and stir into stew.
Simmer 15 minutes.
Add peas and cook 5 minutes more.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for beef stew, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make a classic beef stew. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions, covering the preparation of stew beef and the combination of flavors through various seasonings and vegetables.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. oil
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 onion, chopped
1 c. beef bouillon
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
6 carrots, peeled and sliced or quartered
1 c. sliced celery
4 potatoes, peeled and cut into eighths
12 small white onions
2 medium turnips, peeled and quartered (optional)
4 c. water
1 c. cooked okra (optional)
Directions:
Coat meat with flour; set excess flour aside.
In large skillet or slow-cooking pot with browning unit, heat oil.
Brown meat on all sides.
In slow-cooking pot, combine browned beef, bay leaf, Worcestershire sauce, chopped onion, bouillon, pepper, salt, sugar and vegetables.
Pour water over all.
Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours.
Turn control on high.
Thicken sauce with flour left over from coating (about 1/4 cup), dissolved in a small amount of water.
Add okra, if desired.
Cover and cook on high 10 to 15 minutes, or until slightly thickened.
Makes up to 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a classic beef stew, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step cooking directions, making it a fully relevant and useful response.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. chuck or stew meat
2 c. hot water
1 medium onion, sliced
1 large bay leaf
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of ground cloves (optional)
6 carrots, peeled and cut in 1/2-inch slices
4 potatoes, peeled and cut in eighths
4 stalks celery, quartered lengthwise
1 lb. small white onions
1/4 c. flour
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
In a 3-quart casserole, combine meat, water, sliced onion, bay leaf, salt, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, pepper, garlic powder and cloves.
Cover.
Microwave at High 5 minutes.
Reduce power to Medium and microwave 40 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
Remove bay leaf. Add vegetables.
Cover.
Microwave 35 to 45 minutes, or until meat and vegetables are tender.
Blend flour into water; stir into stew.
Microwave at High 3 to 4 minutes, or until bubbly, stirring once or twice.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Depending on size of vegetables, time will be longer if all ingredients are added at once.
Serves 6 to 8.
Can also be done on the stove or in slow pot.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a classic beef stew, listing all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking directions. It addresses the user's question by offering a complete guide for preparing the dish, thus it is relevant. The mention of microwave cooking time and alternative cooking methods (stove or slow pot) adds additional usefulness.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Gold Medal flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat
2 Tbsp. shortening
6 c. hot water
3 pared potatoes, cut in 1-inch cubes
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 c. celery, sliced 1-inch thick
1/2 c. onion, diced
1 Tbsp. salt
2 beef bouillon cubes
Directions:
Mix flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper together.
Coat meat with flour mixture.
Melt shortening in large skillet; brown meat thoroughly.
Add water; heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 2 hours.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer 30 minutes longer, or until vegetables are tender.
If desired, thicken stew. In a covered jar, shake 1 cup cold water with 2 to 4 tablespoons flour until blended.
Stir into stew.
Heat to boiling; stirring constantly, boil 1 minute.
Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a classic beef stew, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes ingredients, preparation steps, and cooking instructions, all of which are pertinent to creating the dish. The answer also specifies the yield, indicating that it will serve six people, which is relevant information for someone looking to make this recipe. Therefore, the answer is relevant and fully addresses the user's query.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach-Artichoke Dip
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz. each) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichoke, drained and chopped
1/2 c. whipping cream
1 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook and drain spinach; set aside.
Saute butter and onion in large saucepan until golden brown.
Turn heat to medium setting. Add cream cheese in small bits, stirring slowly.
Once cream cheese melts, add spinach, artichokes, whipping cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Heat thoroughly.
Turn into serving dish.
explanation: The provided answer is directly related to the question about making a creamy spinach and artichoke dip. It lists the ingredients needed and provides a step-by-step method for combining and cooking them to achieve the desired creamy consistency. The answer fulfills the user's request for a recipe for this specific dip.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Artichoke Dip
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
3/4 c. diced white or yellow onion
1 1/2 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
3/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. crumbled bouillon cubes
1 1/2 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 tsp. sugar
3/4 c. sour cream
12 oz. frozen spinach, defrosted, drained and chopped
6 oz. canned artichoke bottoms, drained and cut into 1/8-inch slices
1 c. finely shredded Monterey Jack cheese
3/4 tsp. hot sauce (such as Tabasco)
Directions:
In a large saucepan warm the olive oil and butter together over medium heat.
When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until wilted, 3 to 4 minutes.	Stir in the garlic and cook 2 to 3 minutes longer, stirring frequently and stopping before the onion and garlic brown.
Sprinkle the flour and continue cooking, stirring continuously, until the mixture turns a golden-blond color, 10 to 15 minutes.
Then, whisking continuously, slowly pour in the stock until it is smoothly incorporated.
When the mixture begins to simmer, stir in the cream.	Let it return to the simmer.
Remove from the heat and add the Parmesan, chicken base or bouillon cubes, lemon juice and sugar and stir until thoroughly blended.
Add the sour cream, spinach, artichoke bottoms, Monterey Jack cheese and hot sauce and then stir until the ingredients are thoroughly combined and the cheese has melted.	Transfer to a warmed serving bowl and serve immediately with toasted pita chips that have been cut into wedges.
Makes 8 to 10 appetizers.
explanation: The provided answer contains a complete recipe for a creamy spinach and artichoke dip, directly addressing the user's question. It includes all necessary ingredients, detailed preparation steps, and the method to serve the dish, which makes it relevant and useful for someone looking to make this specific appetizer.

chicken pieces
salt
pepper
garlic powder
onion powder
your favorite barbecue sauce (we like Heinz 57)
Directions:
Layer chicken pieces in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder to your taste.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. lard (shortening may be substituted)
1 c. buttermilk (add more if needed)
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients together.
Cut in the lard.
Add buttermilk and stir until a soft dough is formed, then turn onto a lightly floured board and knead until smooth.
Roll out (1/2 inch thick for fluffy biscuits, 1/4 inch for crusty thin ones!!).
Cut to size with a biscuit cutter or cup.
Place on a greased pan. Bake at 450° for 13 to 15 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step process for making buttermilk biscuits, including ingredients and baking instructions, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make fluffy buttermilk biscuits. It gives clear guidance for achieving the desired fluffiness by specifying the thickness of the dough before baking.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Stir together all dry ingredients; add liquid ingredients and mix well just until the dough clings together.
Knead gently on a lightly floured surface 10 to 12 strokes; roll or pat to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut with a biscuit cutter, dipping flour in between cuts; place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake in 450° oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden.
Makes 10 to 12 biscuits.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for making buttermilk biscuits, which directly addresses the user's query about creating fluffy buttermilk biscuits. It includes all the necessary ingredients and detailed directions for preparation and baking.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening, margarine or butter
3/4 c. buttermilk
Directions:
In a bowl, stir together dry ingredients.
Cut in shortening, margarine or butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Make a well in the center, add milk all at once.
Stir just until dough clings together.
On a lightly floured surface, knead gently for 10 to 12 strokes.
Roll or pat dough to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut with biscuit cutter, dipping cutter in flour between cuts.
Place on greased baking sheet.
Bake at 450° for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden.
Makes 10.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making buttermilk biscuits, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make fluffy buttermilk biscuits. It includes all the necessary ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step directions for preparation and baking, ensuring the user can achieve fluffy buttermilk biscuits.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Combine first 5 ingredients, mixing well; cut in butter with a pastry blender or fork until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Add buttermilk, stirring until dry ingredients are moistened.
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead lightly 8 to 10 times.
Roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness; cut with biscuit cutter. Place on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes or until golden.
Yields 1 dozen.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question on making fluffy buttermilk biscuits by listing the ingredients and providing step-by-step baking directions. It includes all the essential information required for someone looking to bake this specific type of biscuit, thus it is relevant to the question asked.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/3 c. shortening
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
melted butter
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder, salt and soda together. Cut in shortening. Make a well in center of dry ingredients and pour in buttermilk. With a fork, stir lightly until all particles are moist.
Pour onto floured pastry board and work in flour until dough isn't sticky. Pat or roll out dough and cut with biscuit cutter.
Place in a greased pan and bake at 450° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Brush with melted butter.
It makes a crisp, flaky biscuit.
Makes about 15 biscuits.
explanation: The answer directly addresses the question by providing a recipe for making fluffy buttermilk biscuits, including the ingredients and step-by-step directions. It ensures the user has all the necessary information to achieve the intended result of fluffy and flaky biscuits.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Homemade Gravy
Ingredients:
pan drippings (chicken, beef or pork)
self-rising flour
hot water
salt to taste
pepper to taste
Directions:
After cooking your meat, pour off grease until just bottom of pan is covered.
Add salt and pepper.
Stir in 2 to 3 heaping tablespoonfuls of flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, until nice brown roux (just before scorching).
Have hot water in bowl ready. Pour about half of water into roux.
Mixture will be thin.
Cook over medium heat, constantly stirring, until desired consistency is reached.
Tastes great with homemade biscuits and scrambled eggs.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Herbed Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. vegetable shortening
2 Tbsp. (1/4 stick) chilled unsalted butter
3/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. chopped assorted fresh herbs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Combine first 4 ingredients in bowl. Cut in shortening and butter with pastry cutter or fingertips until mixture forms coarse crumbs.
Add milk and herbs and stir until mixture forms ball.
Gently knead dough on lightly floured surface, making 8 turns.
Roll out dough on lightly floured surface to 1/2-inch thickness.
Using a 3-inch round cutter, cut out biscuits.
Place on ungreased baking sheet.
Gather scraps; repeat rolling and cutting.
Bake until biscuits are golden, about 14 minutes.
Transfer to rack; cool 5 minutes.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Perfect Pizza
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
1 pkg. dry yeast
3 c. flour
2 small cans tomato sauce
Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Combine water, oil, sugar and salt in a large mixing bowl. Sprinkle yeast over water mixture until dissolved.
Add flour gradually.
Mix well after each addition.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for pizza, which is relevant to the user's question. However, it only includes the ingredients and initial instructions for making the pizza dough, omitting instructions for toppings like mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce. For a complete recipe, it should also include these details and possible additional steps, such as preparing the toppings and assembling the pizza.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Pizza
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
1/4 c. onion
2 eggs
2/3 c. milk
1 c. flour
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
pizza sauce
Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Mix eggs, milk, flour and seasonings.
Brown hamburger and onions.
Drain and place in 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan.
Pour flour mixture over this and bake at 425° for 24 to 25 minutes. Remove.
Drizzle pizza sauce on top and add cheese.
Return and heat until cheeses are melted.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe, but it is for a hamburger casserole, not a simple pizza recipe. The ingredients and steps mentioned are not typical for a basic pizza recipe, which usually involves dough, tomato sauce, and cheese. The requested recipe does not align with the user's question for a simple pizza.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Pizza
Ingredients:
4-4 1/2 c. flour
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 egg, beaten
2 Tbsp. oil
3 c. tomato sauce
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 420°.
In large mixing bowl, combine two cups flour, yeast, and salt.
Stir in water, egg, and oil.
Beat at low speed with mixer for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes at high speed.
By hand, stir in enough flour to make a moderately stiff dough.
Put onto floured surface and knead until smooth (about 5 minutes).
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to coat dough.
Cover, and let rise until size doubles (about one hour).
Divide dough into two portions.
Place each portion on greased pizza pan.
Spread dough out to pan edges.
Top with tomato sauce and cheese, and bake 25 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making pizza, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It addresses all aspects of the user's question by offering a simple recipe for pizza, making it directly relevant to the query.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew, cut into 3/4 inch cubes
1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1 (1 3/8 oz.) envelope onion soup mix
3 c. water
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. barley
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle-mixed vegetables (including juice)
Directions:
Coat beef with flour seasoned with salt and mustard.
Cut bacon 1 inch pieces; fry in Dutch oven.
Remove bacon pieces; add beef to bacon drippings.
Brown beef on all sides.
Add soup mix and Veg-All liquid plus water to give you 3 cups.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Add tomato juice, sugar and barley.
Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add bacon and Veg-All home-style vegetables.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the user's question by offering a specific recipe titled 'Hearty Beef Stew'. It lists all necessary ingredients and provides clear step-by-step directions for preparation, which are suitable for creating a hearty stew with beef. The relevance is confirmed by the presence of beef as the main ingredient and the inclusion of other stew-related components like bacon, barley, and mixed vegetables, aligning with the desired hearty stew theme.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 lb. boneless beef stew meat, cut into cubes
2 c. carrots, cut
2 c. potatoes, cut into cubes
1 whole onion
1 c. frozen peas
1 c. frozen corn
2 stalks celery, cut into pieces
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. oil
2 c. water
8 oz. can tomato sauce
2 beef flavor bouillon cubes
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Coat beef cubes with mixture of 1/4 cup of flour, salt and pepper. In 5-quart Dutch oven, brown meat in oil.
Stir in 2 cups of water, tomato sauce, bouillon cubes, celery and onion.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 1/2 hours or until tender.
Add carrots and potatoes.
Cover.
Simmer an additional 30 to 40 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for a hearty beef stew, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions, which directly addresses the user's request for a beef stew recipe.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
4 parsnips (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 red skin potatoes (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. red wine or beef stock
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper in plastic bag.
Add beef and shake until coated.
In large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add meat in batches and cook until browned, about 20 minutes.
Remove meat. Reduce heat to medium.
Add onion, garlic and remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.
explanation: The generated answer provides a specific recipe for a hearty stew, which includes beef as a main ingredient. The title, ingredients, and directions directly address the user's request for a recipe with beef, making it a relevant response to the question.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. round steak
1 whole onion, diced
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 can beef consomme
1/2 c. vegetable oil
5 potatoes
10 carrots
1/2 celery stalk
1 garlic clove
1 can either wine, water or beer
Directions:
Saute onion and garlic in vegetable oil; cut steak in cubes and flour with dry seasonings.
Brown meat in oil with onion and garlic until all sides of meat brown and flour is saturated.
Add can of consomme and Worcestershire sauce; stir as it thickens. Add 1 more can of any liquid.
Gravy and meat should simmer at least 1 hour.
Add peeled, pared and sliced vegetables.
Cook 1 to 2 more hours.
Add water if too thick.
Should be beefy and thick.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for a hearty beef stew, which directly addresses the user's request for a recipe with beef. It includes all necessary ingredients and steps needed to prepare the dish, ensuring it is relevant and useful for someone looking to make a beef stew.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
water (to cover)
1 stick butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped green onion tops
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces
1/4 c. grated Romano and Parmesan cheese
2 slices white bread, moistened and squeezed
3 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. Progresso bread crumbs
1/2 lb. ground chuck
dash of oregano
dash of basil
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Cut off tops of bell peppers; remove insides and boil 5 minutes.
Drain.
Saute onions, shallots and minced garlic in butter.
Add meat and brown.
Shred moistened bread with fingers into skillet.
Add mushrooms and liquid, cheese, seasoning and bread crumbs.
Remove from heat and stir in eggs, working quickly. Return to heat for 5 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a comprehensive recipe for stuffed bell peppers, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's request for a recipe and contains all the necessary components to prepare the dish, making it highly relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers
3 to 4 medium potatoes
2 tomatoes
2 medium onions
1 green chilli, chopped (optional)
1 tsp. cumin powder or curry powder
salt to taste
1 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. grated cheese
1 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Halve the bell peppers and remove seeds.
Dip in boiling water for a minute and keep aside.
Boil the potatoes; peel and mash coarsely with a fork.
Chop tomatoes and slice the onions.
explanation: The answer provides a relevant recipe for stuffed bell peppers, listing the required ingredients and basic steps for preparation. It directly addresses the user's question by giving the title, ingredients, and a brief overview of the cooking process, which are essential components of a recipe.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the user's question as it directly offers a recipe for stuffed bell peppers. It lists all the necessary ingredients and provides step-by-step preparation and cooking instructions, making it a comprehensive response to the query about how to prepare this dish.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
1/2 roll Prosage
1/2 c. sliced, cooked mushrooms
3 eggs
French fried onions (optional)
1/2 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
4 bell peppers
salt and McKay's chick style to taste
Directions:
Saute Prosage, celery and onion until transparent.
Mix in rice and eggs.
Remove seeds and stem from peppers and parboil them for 5 minutes.
Set peppers in a greased casserole and fill with rice mixture.
Don't crowd peppers as they will swell some in baking. If there is some rice mix left over, it can be placed in between peppers.
Top with French fried onion rings that come in a can.
explanation: The answer provided is relevant to the question as it gives a complete recipe for stuffed bell peppers, including ingredients and step-by-step directions. It addresses the main aspects of the query by providing the necessary details to make the dish.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
5 bell peppers
1 lb. ground meat
1/3 c. butter
1 c. onions, chopped
1 c. bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. red pepper
1/3 c. sherry
2 tomatoes, chopped
2 eggs
1/4 c. cheese, grated
3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Cut bell peppers in half; clean and boil in lightly salted water until tender, approximately 3 to 5 minutes.
Melt butter in a large skillet.
Saute onions, chopped bell peppers and celery for 3 to 4 minutes.
Add ground meat and season with the garlic salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, seasoned salt and red pepper.
Drain excess grease, then add sherry, tomatoes, eggs, cheese and bread crumbs.
Stuff into individual bell pepper shells and bake at 350° for 20 minutes until firm.
Serves 10.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for stuffed bell peppers, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions for preparation and cooking. This directly addresses the user's question about a recipe for stuffed bell peppers.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Beans
Ingredients:
2 c. long grain rice
4 c. water
1 medium onion, cut small
1 carrot, cut small
1 green pepper, cut small
1 (16 oz.) can red kidney beans
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 cubes chicken bouillon
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. red cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/2 can tomato paste
Directions:
Warm oil in large pot (4 quart or more).
Add the onion, carrot and green pepper; cook for about 2 minutes, then add the oregano, black pepper, red pepper, tarragon, salt and cumin.
Stir, then add kidney beans and cook for about 5 minutes at low heat, stirring constantly.
Add the 4 cups of water; increase the heat to high and cook until the water boils.
Stir in the rice, tomato paste and chicken bouillon, then lower the heat to low and cook for about 40 minutes.
Stir to fluff rice after 20 minutes.
To ensure rice is done, stick a spoon into the rice.
If the spoon stays upright, the rice is done.
Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe for cooking rice and kidney beans together, which directly addresses the user's question about what dish they can make with these ingredients. The listed ingredients and detailed cooking instructions are relevant and useful for someone looking to prepare this meal.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Peas
Ingredients:
1 c. dried red kidney beans or pigeon peas
2 c. Uncle Ben's brown rice
coconut milk (optional)
4 cloves garlic
1 medium onion
8 Tbsp. olive oil
1 oz. margarine (soy bean)
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
2 stalks scallion (optional)
Directions:
Thoroughly cook beans plus 4 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 ounce margarine, garlic, onion, cayenne pepper, salt, thyme and scallion in 6 cups water.
This will take approximately 2 hours to cook. If water gets low, add a little more.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes kidney beans and rice, which are the main ingredients mentioned in the question. However, it specifically mentions 'Rice And Peas' using pigeon peas instead of kidney beans, which might confuse the user if they were expecting a recipe with kidney beans exclusively. Additionally, the answer does not address the potential for cooking with rice alone or other possible recipes involving kidney beans and rice, nor does it provide a variety of options for the user to choose from.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 minced garlic cloves
1 Tbsp. canola oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium zucchini, chopped
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 large can garbanzo beans or chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
3 c. cooked rice
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 can red kidney beans (optional)
1 can Mexicorn (optional)
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, saute onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in the tomatoes, zucchini and oregano. Cover and cook for 5 to 6 minutes, until zucchini is tender, stirring occasionally. Add the beans, salt and pepper; cook and stir until heated through. Serve over cooked rice, sprinkle with shredded cheese.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes kidney beans and rice, which directly answers the question. However, it introduces additional ingredients such as zucchini, chickpeas, and Mexicorn, which were not mentioned in the user's question. Despite this, it still offers a relevant response on how to cook with kidney beans and rice, just with extra elements.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
2 lg. cans kidney beans
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lg. onion (chopped)
1 green bell pepper (chopped)
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/4 tsp. dried sage
1 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. Cajun seasoning
1 lb. smoked sausage
2 c long grain white rice
Directions:
In skillet, heat oil over med. heat. Saute onion, bell pepper, garlic in oil for 3-4 minutes. Empty kidney beans in large saucepan. Stir cooked vegetables into beans. Add all seasonings. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer for 30 minutes. Slice sausage and add to beans, continue to simmer for 30 minutes more. Prepare rice as directed. Remove bay leaves from beans.
Serve over rice.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant as it gives a detailed recipe titled 'Red Beans And Rice' that uses both kidney beans and rice as primary ingredients. It includes a comprehensive list of additional ingredients, such as sausage, vegetables, and various spices, which contribute to the dish's flavor profile. The directions outline the process of cooking these ingredients together, serving them over rice, directly addressing the user's question about cooking options with kidney beans and rice.

1 sliced banana, frozen if possible
1 carton strawberry banana yogurt
1/2 c. milk
2 tsp. vanilla

Makes 2 servings.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe involving tofu and soy sauce, which are the ingredients mentioned in the question. However, it focuses on a specific dish (Spicy Fried Tofu) rather than offering multiple possibilities or general advice on what can be made with these ingredients. The inclusion of additional ingredients like dill weed, curry, and various spices, as well as the detailed cooking instructions, diverts from the original question's request for various ways to use tofu and soy sauce.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that uses both tofu and soy sauce as key ingredients, which aligns with the user's question about what to make with these items. However, it does not offer alternative dishes or variations that could be made solely with tofu and soy sauce, limiting its relevance to the full scope of possible answers.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.
explanation: The answer provided directly addresses the question by offering a recipe for a Stir-Fry Tofu and Veggies dish that utilizes tofu and soy sauce as key ingredients. It includes a list of additional ingredients (sake, sesame or vegetable oil, garlic, ginger juice, onion, red pepper, broccoli, snow peas, and cashews or almonds) and a step-by-step guide that clearly illustrates how to prepare the dish. This recipe is therefore relevant and useful to someone looking to make a meal with tofu and soy sauce.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?

Title: Herb Tofu
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. tofu
4 Tbsp. plain yogurt
3 scallions, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. parsley leaves, chopped
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, cut in half and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 zucchini, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:

Add chopped vegetables and salt and pepper to taste.
Place on serving platter with bagels, crackers or pita bread.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that utilizes tofu and soy sauce, which are the ingredients mentioned in the question. However, it is not a straightforward response to the question of what can be made with just those two ingredients, as it includes a comprehensive list of additional ingredients and detailed cooking instructions for a Tofu Chili. While it hints at the use of tofu and soy sauce in a dish, the user's question could imply simpler or alternative dishes, which are not addressed in the provided answer.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Parmesan Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. coarsely crushed saltines
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. onion salt
3 Tbsp. evaporated milk
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 broiler-fryer chicken (about 3 1/2 lb.), cut up
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients in a shallow dish.
In another dish, combine milk and oil.
Dip chicken pieces into milk mixture, then roll in the Parmesan mixture. Place chicken, skin side up, in a shallow baking pan.
Bake uncovered at 375° for 1 hour or until chicken is tender and no longer pink.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Parmesan Chicken, which includes steps and ingredients relevant to making chicken with a Parmesan crust. question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) fryer, cut into serving pieces
freshly ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. thyme
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
1/3 c. fine bread crumbs
1/3 c. water
1 Tbsp. oil
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/3 c. Marsala wine
Directions:
In a paper bag, place seasonings, cheese, parsley and crumbs; coat chicken by shaking a few pieces at a time in the bag.
Oil a shallow roasting pan; pour in the water and arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle chicken with oil and melted margarine and bake at 350°, uncovered, for 30 minutes.
Pour wine over chicken.
Lower oven heat to 325°; cover pan and bake 15 minutes longer.
Remove foil; raise oven heat to 350° and bake 10 minutes longer.
Yield:
4 servings.
Approximate calories/serving:
365.
explanation: The provided answer contains a recipe for baked chicken parmesan but does not specifically address how to achieve a crispy texture for the dish. While it includes most of the necessary ingredients and steps for making chicken parmesan, the process for crisping the chicken is not detailed.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Parmesan Chicken(Serves 12)
Ingredients:
3 c. fresh bread crumbs (about 6 slices)
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3/4 c. chopped parsley
3 cloves garlic, minced
3/4 tsp. each: salt, black pepper and paprika
3 broiler/fryer chickens, each cut into 8 pieces
3/4 c. unsalted butter or margarine, melted (1 1/2 sticks)
Directions:
In a 1-gallon food storage bag, combine bread crumbs, cheese, parsley, garlic, salt, pepper and paprika.
Dip chicken in butter. Shake 2 pieces at a time in the bag to coat with crumb mixture. Arrange in 2 (15 1/2 x 10 x 1-inch) baking pans lined with aluminum foil; sprinkle any remaining coating mixture over the chicken.
(At this point the chicken can be covered tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerated up to 6 hours.)
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Parmesan Chicken which includes ingredients and a brief preparation process, but it does not specifically address how to achieve crispy chicken. question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Chicken Parmesan
Ingredients:
3 chicken breasts, skinned and boned
2 eggs, slightly beaten
bread crumbs
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. oil
2 c. tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
8 oz. sliced Mozzarella
Directions:
Pound chicken until thin.
Combine eggs, salt and pepper.
Dip chicken in egg mixture and then in bread crumbs.
Brown quickly in oil.
Drain chicken and put in casserole pan.
While chicken is cooking, stir tomato sauce, basil and garlic.
Heat to boiling. Simmer 10 minutes.
Add margarine.
Pour over chicken.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top.
Cover.
Cook 1/2 hour at 350°.
Uncover and put Mozzarella cheese on top; bake until cheese melts (approximately 5 minutes).
Serve with side of spaghetti.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making chicken parmesan, which includes all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions on how to achieve crispy chicken for this dish. It directly addresses the user's question by providing a complete guide on preparing crispy chicken parmesan.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Layered Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1/4 c. green onion slices
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans tuna, drained and flaked
1 tsp. dill weed
4 c. shredded lettuce
1/2 c. cooked shell macaroni, drained
2 c. chopped seeded cucumber
2 c. chopped tomato
10 oz. frozen peas
6 slices cooked and crumbled bacon
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Combine salad dressing, green onions and mustard.
Set aside. Toss tuna with dill.
In a 3-quart serving bowl layer lettuce, shells, cucumber, tomato, tuna, peas and bacon (in that order). Spread salad dressing mixture over bacon, sealing to edge of bowl. Sprinkle with cheese.
Cover.
Chill several hours or overnight. Toss to serve.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for a tuna salad, which directly addresses the user's request for a quick recipe involving tuna. It includes all necessary ingredients and detailed directions, making it a fully relevant response to the question.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/4 c. cold water
1 1/4 c. boiling water
2 vegetable bouillon cubes
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1/4 small onion
1 rib celery, cut into 1-inch pieces
3 sprigs parsley
3 pimiento-stuffed olives
1 (6 1/2 or 7 oz.) can tuna in vegetable oil, drained
Directions:
Sprinkle gelatin over cold water in blender container; allow to stand while assembling other ingredients.
Add boiling water, cover and process at low speed until gelatin dissolves.
Add bouillon cubes with remaining ingredients.
Cover and process at high speed just until vegetables are chopped.
Turn into 3 or 4-cup mold.
Chill until firm.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The provided answer is not relevant to the question because it suggests a recipe for a gelatin-based Creamy Tuna Salad, which doesn't align with the request for a quick tuna salad recipe. The typical components of a quick tuna salad would not include gelatin, boiling water, or vegetable bouillon cubes.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Barley-Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. pearl barley, washed
2 qt. homemade chicken stock or 3 (10 3/4 oz. each) cans chicken broth, strained plus 3 cans water
1 small onion, cut into fourths
1 carrot, cut into thirds
1 stalk celery, cut into 1-inch slices
1 tsp. thyme
1 bay leaf
freshly ground pepper to taste
3 to 5 carrots, sliced
2 stalks celery, sliced
1/2 zucchini, sliced
1/2 c. onion, chopped
2 c. fresh spinach, chopped
Directions:
Place barley, chicken stock, onion quarters, carrot thirds, celery slices, thyme and bay leaf in a large soup pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for about 1 hour or until barley is tender.
Add sliced carrots, celery, zucchini and chopped onion and cook until tender.
Add spinach a few minutes before serving.
Makes nine 1-cup servings.
Per serving:
100 total calories; trace sat-fat calories.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe titled 'Barley-Vegetable Soup' that includes both barley and a variety of vegetables such as carrots, celery, zucchini, onion, and spinach. This directly addresses the user's question about what they can cook with barley and vegetables, offering a complete and useful solution.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. beef cubes
1 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 qt. water or vegetable stock
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
2 peppercorns
1 tsp. allspice
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 tsp. Spike (Gayelord-Hauser) seasoning
1/2 c. barley
1 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. diced carrots
2 c. fresh or canned tomatoes
2 Tbsp. Tamari soy sauce
Directions:
Brown meat in oil. Add water or stock and bring to a boil. Skim off foam if present. Add parsley and spices; cover and simmer 30 minutes. Add barley and vegetables; cover and simmer an hour or until barley is done. Add Tamari sauce and garnish with chopped fresh parsley.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe, Barley Soup, which includes both barley and vegetables as requested in the question. question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. barley (long or quick cooking)
2 qt. meat stock or canned broth (low-sodium)
1/2 c. diced carrots
1/2 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
1 lb. can whole tomatoes (low sodium), drained, or 3 to 4 medium tomatoes, diced
1/2 tsp. thyme leaves, crushed
1 bay leaf
1/2 lb. fresh sliced mushrooms
1 small zucchini, diced
Directions:
If using long-cooking barley, rinse barley in colander and remove any foreign objects.
In small soup pot, combine barley with meat stock or broth.
Cook over medium heat about 1 hour. Add carrots, celery, onion, tomatoes, thyme and bay leaf. Continue cooking for 20 minutes.
Add mushrooms and zucchini and if using quick cooking barley, add it now.
Cook over low heat another 15 minutes.
Makes 8 servings (1 cup each).
explanation: The answer directly addresses the user's question by providing a specific recipe, Vegetable Barley Soup, which includes barley and vegetables as primary ingredients. The recipe details the ingredients and steps needed to cook this dish, making it highly relevant to the user's inquiry about cooking with barley and vegetables.

Ingredients:

1/2 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Combine in top of a double boiler sugar, flour and salt.
Stir in milk.
Cook over hot water until thick, stirring constantly. Add egg yolks and cook another 3 minutes.
Add butter; cool.
Add vanilla and peanut butter.
Mix well.
Pour into a baked pie shell and let cool.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients:
2/3 c. Sugar
1/3 c. Cornstarch
1/2 tsp. Salt
1-1/2 c. (12 oz. can) undiluted Evaporated Milk
1 c. Water
1 tsp. Vanilla Extract
2 Eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. Creamy Peanut Butter
1 ready made Chocolate Flavored Pie Crust
2 Tbsp. coarsely chopped Peanuts
1 (12 oz.) bag (2 cups) Milk Chocolate Morsels
Directions:
In medium saucepan, combine Sugar, Cornstarch and Salt. Stir in Milk and Water. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until slightly thickened. Turn to low heat and add small amounts of cooked mixture to the Eggs. Mix well and return Egg mixture to saucepan and continue stirring. Mix in 1-3/4 cups of the Chocolate Morsels and stir until melted. Allow mixture to come to a boil and thicken on low for 3 minutes (continually stirring). Remove from heat and add Vanilla and Peanut Butter; stir until melted.
explanation: The provided answer is highly relevant to the user's question. It offers a detailed recipe for making a chocolate peanut butter pie, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. All components of the recipe directly address the user's query and provide clear guidance on how to create the desired dessert.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 large butternut squash, halved
3 Tbsp butter
1/4 tsp cinnamon
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/8 tsp cloves
1 Tbsp sugar
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 onion chopped
2 Idaho potatoes, peeled and chopped into large pieces
8 c chicken stock (or water + bouillon cubes)
1/4 c heavy cream (optional)
salt and white pepper to taste
Directions:
In a preheated, 400 degree oven, roast the butternut squash with the seasonings, butter and sugar, until soft and browned. Remove from oven and scoop squash from rind.
In a soup pot, heat olive oil and saute onions.
When translucent, add potatoes and squash flesh.
Cover with chicken stock and simmer until potatoes are soft.
Remove from heat and puree with stick blender or in an upright blender.
Return to soup pot and add heavy cream.
Season to taste.
Enjoy!
explanation: The answer provided is relevant to the user's question. It gives a step-by-step recipe for making roasted butternut squash soup using the same main ingredients and cooking methods mentioned in the question. The recipe includes instructions for roasting the squash, combining it with other ingredients, and pureeing the mixture, which are key steps in creating a roasted butternut squash soup.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the question. It offers a detailed recipe for roasted butternut squash soup, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking directions. The title and ingredients list directly address the query about making a roasted butternut squash soup. question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:

Ingredients:
4 c. cubed, peeled butternut squash
2 c. water
2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 chopped fresh basil leaves or 1 tsp. dried
3 sprigs marjoram or 1 tsp. dried
2 Tbsp. cooking wine
2 bay leaves
2 bouillon cubes
1 tsp. dried coriander
1 tsp. powdered cardamom
Directions:
Cook the squash in water with herbs and bouillon cubes.
Saute onion and garlic.
Add to squash and puree in a processor.
Return to pan.
Add broth, soy sauce and cooking wine.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
If the soup is too thin, thicken with 1 to 3 tablespoons cornstarch moistened in 1 to 3 tablespoons water.
Serves 4.
Serve warm or cold with a dollop of sour cream or yogurt.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger
2 large carrots, peeled and sliced (about 1 c.)
2 medium butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut into chunks (about 2 lb. each)
40 saltine crackers
1 c. chopped onions
3 c. apple juice
2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
In large saucepan, over medium-high heat, cook carrots, onions and garlic in margarine until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add ginger, curry, cinnamon and nutmeg; cook for 1 minute.
Add squash and apple juice.
Heat to a boil.
Cover; reduce heat.
Simmer for 15 minutes or until squash is tender. In blender or food processor container, puree soup, in batches, until smooth.
Return to saucepan; heat through.
Serve hot or chilled with crackers. Makes 8 servings.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the user's question about making roasted butternut squash soup by giving a recipe that includes butternut squash as a main ingredient. question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. sliced onion
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. chopped broccoli
1 minced clove garlic or 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. minced ginger or 1/2 tsp. powdered ginger
1/2 to 1 lb. lean meat (beef, chicken, pork or shrimp, cut in slivers
3/4 c. broth or water and chicken or beef bouillon
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat skillet to medium-high heat.
Add oil and when sizzling hot, add meat, vegetables, garlic and ginger and stir-fry until meat is done and vegetables are tender-crisp.
Blend cornstarch with chicken broth or with bouillon and water.
Stir into meat and vegetable mixture.
Add soy sauce and reduce heat.
Cook for 5 more minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Fresh Stir-Fry Melange
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. fresh green pepper strips
3 1/2 c. fresh red pepper strips
2 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. sliced celery
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh onion
1/2 c. glove garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. dried leaf oregano
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/4 c. olive oil
1 tsp. wine vinegar
2 tomatoes, cut in wedges
Directions:
Stir-fry first 10 ingredients in hot oil in skillet over medium-high heat until peppers are tender-crisp.
Add vinegar and tomatoes.
Cook until heated through.
Yields 6 servings. Has about 130 calories each.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Jessie'S Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 potato, quartered, sliced very thin
1 small onion, cut into thin strips
1 green tomato, quartered, sliced thin
2 or 3 okra, sliced thin
1 small squash, sliced thin
Directions:
Coat in meal with a little flour added.
Cook in oil on medium to high heat.
Stir regular.
Do not overcook.
May also add hot pepper.
Salt and pepper to taste.
explanation: The provided recipe is partly relevant as it gives a list of ingredients and basic cooking instructions for a stir-fry. question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Basic Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
10 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut in strips
soy sauce to taste
garlic powder to taste
4 tsp. peanut oil
1/2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 c. cauliflower, chopped
1/2 c. onions, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. celery, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. green bell peppers, sliced into strips
4 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 c. water
Directions:
In a glass bowl, combine chicken, soy sauce and garlic powder. Stir well and set aside.
Heat 2 teaspoons oil in skillet or wok. Stir in all vegetables and stir-fry 3 to 5minutes until onions are translucent.
Remove to bowl.
Heat remaining 2 teaspoons oil; add chicken and stir-fry until chicken is cooked, about 5 minutes. Return vegetables to skillet.
Stir in cornstarch mixture and continue cooking until sauce thickens.
explanation: The provided answer is directly related to the user's question about an easy stir-fry recipe. It lists ingredients and gives step-by-step cooking instructions, including the use of vegetables and chicken, which are typical components of a stir-fry. The title 'Basic Stir-Fry' clearly indicates the type of recipe, and the inclusion of soy sauce and garlic powder suggests seasoning, which is essential for a stir-fry flavor profile. The answer successfully addresses the user's request for a stir-fry recipe, making it relevant and informative.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
1 cut up chicken
14 c. water
1 medium, chopped onion
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced carrot
1 c. sliced celery
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. parsley
1/2 (1 lb.) pkg. egg noodles
Directions:
Combine chicken, onion, bay leaves, salt and pepper; boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, until chicken is tender, for 1 hour. Remove chicken; cool, debone and cut into pieces.
Add remaining ingredients; simmer 25 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides some of the ingredients and basic steps needed to make a chicken noodle soup, but it does not mention important aspects such as seasoning, cooking times, or serving suggestions. It also lacks the detail on how to properly cook and combine the ingredients to achieve a classic chicken noodle soup taste.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken (cut up)
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. monosodium glutamate
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. marjoram or basil
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen noodles
4 to 5 carrots, sliced
4 stocks chopped celery
1/4 c. parsley
1 chopped onion
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Place all ingredients in a pot, cover with water and simmer until chicken is done.
Remove chicken and debone, cut in small pieces, set aside.
Add noodles to boiling broth, cook until almost done then add cut up chicken, stir until chicken is heated through and serve.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. chicken stock
2 c. diced, cooked chicken
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. sliced green onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. uncooked noodles
2 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
Directions:
Add chicken, celery, onion and seasoning to stock.
Bring to a boil.
Add noodles.
Cover and cook until noodles are almost tender (5 to 10 minutes).
Mix flour with small amount of milk until smooth.
Add remaining milk.
Stir into soup.
Cook to desired thickness.
explanation: The answer provided offers a complete recipe for making chicken noodle soup, which directly addresses the user's question. It lists all the necessary ingredients and provides step-by-step directions for preparing the dish, making it fully relevant and useful for someone looking to make classic chicken noodle soup.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup(Low-Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 qt. water
1 lb. boneless chicken breasts
1 carrot, sliced
1 onion, chopped
1 rib celery, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 clove garlic, minced (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
1 tsp. basil (optional)
5 sprigs parsley (optional)
3 to 4 peppercorns
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 oz. flat noodles
1 c. onion, chopped
3 carrots, sliced
3 ribs celery, sliced
Directions:
Cook the first 11 ingredients 1 hour.
Skim foam.
Refrigerate chicken.
Skim fat.
Bring broth to a boil and add the remaining ingredients plus cubed chicken.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Yields 16 cups.
Contains 70 calories per cup and 2 fat grams per serving.
explanation: The provided answer gives a detailed recipe for making chicken noodle soup, which is relevant to the question about how to make classic chicken noodle soup. question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 chicken, cut up
water
2 celery stalks, sliced
1/2 onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. thin egg noodles
1/2 c. half and half
Directions:
In a large Dutch oven, cover chicken with water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes or until tender. Remove chicken.
Reserve broth.
Bone and shred chicken.
Set aside. Discard bones and skin.
Saute celery and onion in butter until limp.
Add flour.
Cook, stirring until golden brown.
Add reserved broth, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Add noodles. Cook until noodles are tender.
Stir occasionally.
Stir in chicken and half and half.
explanation: The provided answer contains a detailed recipe for a Creamy Chicken Noodle Soup, which directly addresses the user's question on how to make a classic chicken noodle soup. It includes the necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions, closely following the theme of the question.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for making mashed potatoes in advance, which is a usage method for leftover mashed potatoes. However, it does not directly address different possible uses for leftover mashed potatoes beyond making more mashed potatoes. Therefore, it partially addresses the question by offering a potential solution but does not fully enumerate all possible uses.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Do Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes, peeled, cooked and kept hot
8 oz. cream cheese, softened
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, lightly beaten
1/4 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot potatoes in large mixer bowl.
Add cream cheese and butter.
Beat well until cheese and butter are both melted and mixed.
Mix in sour cream.
To the milk, add eggs and onions.
Add to potato mixture with salt and pepper.
Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in a greased 9-inch round casserole dish and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.
Bake in a 350° oven for 45 minutes, until lightly browned on top.
Serves 8 to 12.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe for making Do Ahead Mashed Potatoes, which uses leftover mashed potatoes as a base. It addresses the use of leftover mashed potatoes but does not directly answer potential other uses or suggestions for leftover mashed potatoes, which might have included ideas like making potato pancakes, adding them to soups or stews, or using them as a filling for sandwiches or wraps. While the recipe is relevant, it does not encompass a broad range of possibilities for using leftover mashed potatoes, thus making it only partly relevant to the original question.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes
6 oz. cream cheese
1 c. sour cream
2 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
chopped green onions (optional)
Directions:

Cool.
Cover and place in refrigerator.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk

Directions:

Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:

Ingredients:

butter and paprika
Directions:

Cover.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. thinly sliced onions (the more onions, the better)
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
3 cans beef broth
3 Tbsp. cognac (optional)
1 to 2 c. grated Swiss or Parmesan cheese
toasted sliced French bread
Directions:
In heavy bottomed, 4-quart covered pot, melt butter and oil. Add onions.
Cover and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.
Stir in salt and sugar.
Cook over moderate heat for 30 to 40 minutes, stirring frequently, until onions are deep golden brown.
Sprinkle in flour and stir over low heat for several minutes to cook flour. In a separate pot, bring broth to a boil.
Remove soup pot from heat and add boiling liquid, wine and seasonings.
Simmer, partially covered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Just before serving, stir in cognac.
Pour in soup tureen or individual ovenproof bowls. Stir in some cheese and top with toasted French bread.
Sprinkle lightly with paprika.
Place bowls on cookie sheet and cover with the rest of the cheese.
Bake 15 minutes in a 325° oven and serve immediately.
explanation: The provided answer is a detailed recipe for making classic French onion soup, which directly addresses the question. It includes all the necessary ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step cooking instructions, making it fully relevant to the user's request for information on how to prepare the dish.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
5 medium yellow onions
5 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. sugar
6 c. beef consomme
3 c. chicken broth
2 c. burgundy wine
1 c. white wine
3 c. water
2 Tbsp. beef base
few dashes brandy
garlic powder and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. dry parsley, Parmesan cheese, garlic and cheese croutons
Directions:
Saute onions in butter and oil in a large pot.
Cook over medium heat until onions are soft.
Sprinkle onions with sugar and toss together.
Add stocks and wine, water and beef base.
Stir well and bring to boil.
Add brandy, parsley flakes, garlic powder and pepper to taste.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making classic French onion soup, listing all necessary ingredients and offering step-by-step instructions on how to prepare it. The directions align with the user's question about how to make the soup, making it a relevant response.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
4 large onions
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
fresh pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. parsley
1/8 tsp. thyme
2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans beef consomme
1 c. dry white wine
cognac
seasoned croutons
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, shredded or sliced Provolone
Directions:
Slice and chop onions.
Saute in butter until limp.
Sprinkle with flour, pepper, garlic powder, sugar, parsley and thyme.
Cook until golden brown.
Add enough water to consomme to make 1 quart. Combine with onion mixture and add wine; simmer 45 minutes.
At the last minute, stir in cognac (no more than 2 tablespoons).
explanation: The answer provided is a detailed recipe for making classic French onion soup, which directly addresses the user's question. It lists the ingredients, gives step-by-step directions, and includes specific quantities and cooking times, making it a relevant and useful response.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
4 large white onions
2 large yellow onions
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter
4 c. beef stock
4 c. chicken or poultry broth
1 loaf French bread
Parmesan cheese
Gruyere cheese
1 bottle dry sherry
Directions:
Slice onions paper thin.
Fill large pot to the top with onions.
Add 1/4 cup of butter and simmer on low until onions are translucent.
Mix in 1 teaspoon of dry mustard, salt and pepper. Add equal amounts of beef and chicken stock and 1/4 cup of sherry. Cook on low (without boiling) for 6 to 8 hours a day, for two days. Add sherry to replace fluid as it evaporates.
Cut French bread into thin slices and place on a baking sheet.
Bake in oven on low temperature for 3 to 4 hours, until hard.
Grate Gruyere cheese on bread and continue baking for 1 hour.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making classic French onion soup, including the ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to make the dish using appropriate methods and ingredients.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. yellow onions
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 tsp. black pepper (coarse)
1 Tbsp. flour (regular)
3 cans beef broth
3 c. water
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper
French bread (8 slices)
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel onions, slice thinly (about 5 cups).
Put butter in a 4-quart saucepan; heat over moderately high heat until butter melts.
Add onions and pepper to butter.
Saute onion mixture, stirring often
until onions are a light golden brown.
Sprinkle onions with flour; stir until all traces of flour disappear.
Cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat. Gradually add beef broth, stirring onion mixture all the time; stir in water and bay leaf.
Return to moderately high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low. Cook onion soup, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Discard bay leaf; add salt and pepper to taste.
explanation: The answer provides a comprehensive and accurate recipe for making classic French onion soup, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions. It directly addresses the question and offers all the information needed to successfully prepare the dish.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed fresh basil leaves
3 Tbsp. pine nuts (available in most grocery stores)
2 cloves garlic
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese (or Parmesan and romano)
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Place basil, pine nuts, garlic and cheese in the work bowl of a food processor and process until a near-puree is obtained.
Pour oil slowly through the feed tube while the motor runs and scrap down the sides of the work bowl with a rubber spatula once or twice.
Run 20 to 30 seconds longer.
Remove and reserve.
Makes approximately 1/2 cup.
This may be frozen. Can be served over pasta and used with seafood and chicken dishes.
explanation: The answer provided is relevant to the question as it gives a specific recipe for an easy pesto sauce, listing the ingredients and providing step-by-step instructions on how to prepare it. question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce(This Sauce Is Good On Ice Cream Or Cobbler.)
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 3/4 c. hot water
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs, well beaten

Fill ice cream freezer container no more than 2/3 full.
Start cranking!

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Lemon Chicken, which is related to the question as it involves using lemon. However, it does not specifically mention 'herb' or the process of 'roasting', both of which are key aspects of the question. question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Layered Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 c. milk
2 egg yolks, beaten
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. heavy cream, whipped
4 to 6 firm bananas, sliced
chopped walnuts (optional)
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, combine the flour and brown sugar.
Stir in the milk; cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly.
Cook and stir 1 minute more.
Remove from the heat. Gradually stir about 1 cup hot mixture into egg yolks.
Return all to the saucepan.
Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat; stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally.
Fold in the whipped cream.
explanation: The provided answer outlines a recipe for a type of banana pudding, but it lacks specific mention of a 'classic' banana pudding. However, it does provide a detailed recipe that could be adapted into a classic banana pudding, making it partly relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Layered Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
1/3 c. flour
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. heavy cream, whipped
4 to 6 firm bananas, sliced
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, combine flour and brown sugar; stir in milk.
Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more.
Remove from the heat.
Gradually stir about 1 cup hot mixture into egg yolks.
Return all to the saucepan.
Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally.
Fold in the whipped cream. Layer a third of the pudding in a 2 quart glass bowl.
Top with half the bananas.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining pudding. Cover and chill at least 1 hour before serving.
Yield:
8 servings.
explanation: The provided answer offers a complete recipe for classic banana pudding, including ingredients and step-by-step directions. The recipe aligns with the question, which asks for a recipe for classic banana pudding.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?

Ingredients:
4 medium Russet potatoes (cut into large wedges)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
garlic salt
ketchup
Directions:
Place potatoes in large bowl; add cold water to cover and let stand for 15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Set aside. Drain potatoes in a colander. Spread on a double layer of paper towels. Cover with a second layer of paper towels. Press down on the towels to dry potatoes. Transfer potatoes to a clean large bowl. Sprinkle with oil, pepper and salt; toss gently to combine. Arrange seasoned potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, using a spatula turn potatoes; sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake until golden, about 20 minutes, turning baking sheet after 10 minutes for even browning. Serve immediately with ketchup on the side.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. onion, chopped medium
1/2 c. bell pepper, chopped medium
2 Tbsp. garlic, minced
1/2 c. parsley flakes, double if fresh
1 tsp. cayenne pepper, adjust to taste
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. shrimp, cleaned and deveined
1/4 c. tomato paste
1 c. tomato sauce
1 c. water
Directions:
In a 10 inch skillet, heat oil.
Add flour, stir on medium heat until flour begins to brown.
Add onion, bell pepper, garlic, parsley, cayenne, black pepper and salt.
Simmer on medium heat until onion is limp and clear.
Add shrimp, cook until all shrimp are pink.
Add tomato paste, tomato sauce and water.
Simmer 20 minutes on low heat.
Serve over rice.
Serves 3 to 4.
explanation: The provided answer offers a recipe for Cajun Shrimp Creole, which includes shrimp as a primary ingredient.
